title: Russia artillery damages another hospital, Ukraine says; US expects 'ugly next few weeks' of fighting: Live updates
description: Russia appears to be regrouping from recent losses. President Joe Biden called for a removal of normal trade relations with Russia. Live updates.
content: Devastating economic sanctions from the U.S. and its allies haven't stopped Russia's assault on Ukraine, which resulted in damage to another hospital — this time a cancer hospital in the southern cit… [+6650 chars]
